entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo存在一个反序列化漏洞，攻击者可以通过构造恶意的序列化数据，利用Dubbo服务进行远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/f0406b4953b07128068c78865f69dd80ff5a0618/code%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-17564%2Fdocker-compose.yml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo 2.5.x至2.7.4版本中存在不安全的反序列化漏洞。攻击者可以通过HTTP POST请求发送恶意的Java对象，可能导致远程代码执行，当HTTP启用时，可能完全控制Provider实例。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

影响版本： 2.5.x-2.5.10, 2.6.0-2.6.7, 2.7.0-2.7.4

搜索语法： app=”APACHE-dubbo”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/f0406b4953b07128068c78865f69dd80ff5a0618/http%2Fvulnerabilities%2Fapache%2Fapache-dubbo-cve-2019-17564.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号

entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo 2.7.0至2.7.4、2.6.0至2.6.7及所有2.5.x版本中存在反序列化漏洞，由于在接受HTTP POST请求时接受不受信任的Java对象，攻击者可以完全控制Provider实例（如果启用了HTTP）。攻击需要发送恶意的Java对象。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

影响版本： 2.5.x, 2.6.0 <= version <= 2.6.7, 2.7.0 <= version <= 2.7.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12444

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache Dubbo versions 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions contain an insecure deserialization caused by accepting untrusted Java objects in HTTP POST requests, letting attackers fully compromise a Provider instance if HTTP is enabled, exploit requires attacker to send malicious Java object.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Dor-Tumarkin/CVE-2019-17564-FastJson-Gadget
  • https://github.com/Exploit-3389/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Jaky5155/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/r00t4dm/CVE-2019-17564

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号

entry.title: Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-0796

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) 在处理某些请求时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞执行任意代码。此漏洞需要网络访问SMBv3服务。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3)

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12271

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) contains a remote code execution caused by mishandling of certain requests in the SMBv3 protocol, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to SMBv3 service.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/156732/Microsoft-Windows-SMB-3.1.1-Remote-Code-Execution.html
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157110/SMBv3-Compression-Buffer-Overflow.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

entry.title: Apache HTTP Server 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-11984

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server 2.4.32至2.4.44版本中的mod_proxy_uwsgi模块存在信息泄露及可能的远程代码执行漏洞，远程攻击者可通过发送特制请求访问敏感信息并可能执行任意代码。

产品厂商： apache

产品名称： http_server

影响版本： 2.4.32 <= version <= 2.4.44

搜索语法： server: cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/eec91c8e590de65c7d044b8a21a65789bc4948d2/code%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-11984.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: SonicWall Email Security 输入验证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： SonicWall Email Security 输入验证漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-20021

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： SonicWall Email Security 10.0.9.x 版本中存在一个由于HTTP请求处理不当导致的输入验证漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过发送特制的HTTP请求创建管理员账户。

产品厂商： SonicWall

产品名称： SonicWall Email Security

影响版本： 10.0.9.x

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12461

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

SonicWall Email Security 10.0.9.x contains a vulnerability caused by improper input validation in HTTP request handling, letting remote attackers create an administrative account, exploit requires sending a crafted HTTP request.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/SUPRAAA-1337/CVE-2021-20021

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： SonicWall Email Security 输入验证漏洞

entry.content:

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-31706

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： vRealize Log Insight 由于验证不足导致目录遍历漏洞，允许未经认证的攻击者向操作系统注入文件，漏洞利用无需认证。

产品厂商： VMware

产品名称： vRealize Log Insight

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

vRealize Log Insight contains a directory traversal caused by insufficient validation, letting unauthenticated attackers inject files into the operating system, exploit requires no authentication.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/ddb06c8c45d9
  • https///github.com:horizon3ai/vRealizeLogInsightRCE.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"vrealize log insight"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: FortiOS SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FortiOS SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-42475

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： FortiOS SSL-VPN和FortiProxy SSL-VPN的特定版本中存在堆缓冲区溢出漏洞，远程未认证攻击者可通过精心构造的请求执行任意代码或命令。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS SSL-VPN, FortiProxy SSL-VPN

影响版本： FortiOS SSL-VPN: 7.2.0-7.2.2, 7.0.0-7.0.8, 6.4.0-6.4.10, 6.2.0-6.2.11, 6.0.15及更早版本; FortiProxy SSL-VPN: 7.2.0-7.2.1, 7.0.7及更早版本

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12142

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

FortiOS SSL-VPN versions 7.2.0-7.2.2, 7.0.0-7.0.8, 6.4.0-6.4.10, 6.2.0-6.2.11, 6.0.15 and earlier, and FortiProxy SSL-VPN versions 7.2.0-7.2.1, 7.0.7 and earlier contain a heap-based buffer overflow caused by crafted requests, letting remote unauthenticated attackers execute arbitrary code or commands.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://fortiguard.com/psirt/FG-IR-22-398
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/c670713df10f
  • https://github.com/0xhaggis/CVE-2022-42475

  • https://github.com/bryanster/ioc-cve-2022-42475

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

漏洞描述： Exim 4.92至4.92.2版本中存在一个堆缓冲区溢出漏洞，位于string.c文件中的string_vformat函数，涉及长EHLO命令。远程攻击者可以通过发送特制的EHLO命令来执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Exim

产品名称： Exim

影响版本： 4.92 <= version <= 4.92.2

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Exim 4.92 through 4.92.2 contains a remote code execution caused by a heap-based buffer overflow in string_vformat in string.c involving a long EHLO command, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending a specially crafted EHLO command.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2019/09/28/1
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2019/09/28/2

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

entry.title: TP-Link TL-WR940N/841N 命令注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： TP-Link TL-WR940N/841N 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-33538

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： TP-Link TL-WR940N V2/V4和TL-WR841N V8/V10路由器中存在一个认证后的命令注入漏洞。该漏洞位于WlanNetworkRpm.htm中的ssid1参数，允许注入任意shell命令。攻击成功时，攻击者可以在设备上执行任意命令。

产品厂商： TP-Link

产品名称： TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N

影响版本： TL-WR940N V2/V4, TL-WR841N V8/V10

来源： https://github.com/mrowkoob/CVE-2023-33538-msf

类型： CVE-2023:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • tplink_ssid1_rce.rb

来源概述

CVE-2023-33538 – TP-Link TL-WR940N/841N Command Injection (Metasploit module)

This Metasploit auxiliary module targets an authenticated command injection vulnerability in TP-Link TL-WR940N V2/V4 and TL-WR841N V8/V10 routers.
The issue lies in the vulnerable ssid1 parameter used in WlanNetworkRpm.htm, which allows injection of arbitrary shell commands.

When successful, it allows the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the device.

More information about the CVE:
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-33538

How to run this module?

  1. Copy the .rb file into your Metasploit modules folder, for example:
  1. Start Metasploit console:
  1. Search and use the module:
  1. Set required options:

The module does not perform authentication. You must manually extract the Authorization cookie and session prefix from a successful login to the router’s web interface.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-33538
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20230609111043/https://github.com/a101e-IoTvul/iotvul/blob/main/tp-link/3/TL-WR940N_TL-WR841N_userRpm_WlanNetworkRpm_Command_Injection.md

Disclaimer

This module is intended for educational purposes only.
Do not use this code against devices or infrastructure you do not own or have explicit permission to test.

Issues

If you find bugs, or have ideas for improvements – feel free to open an issue or leave a comment. Let’s make it better together.

entry.title: Motors WordPress Theme 未经身份验证的权限提升漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Motors WordPress Theme 未经身份验证的权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-4322

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress的Motors主题在所有版本（包括5.6.67）中存在通过密码更新“账户接管”导致的未经身份验证的权限提升漏洞。这是由于主题在更新用户密码之前没有正确验证用户的身份。这使得未经身份验证的攻击者可以更改任意用户的密码，包括管理员，并利用这一点获得对其账户的访问权限。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Motors WordPress Theme

影响版本： <= 5.6.67

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-4322

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-4322.py
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-4322 : Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation via Password Update “Account Takeover 🔥”

Description :

The Motors theme for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation via account takeover in all versions up to, and including, 5.6.67. This is due to the theme not properly validating a user’s identity prior to updating their password. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change arbitrary user passwords, including those of administrators, and leverage that to gain access to their account.

Metrics :

CNA: Wordfence Base Score: 9.8 ⚫ CRITICAL Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

📌 Themes Information:

  • Plugin: Motors <= 5.6.67 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation via Password Update/Account Takeover
  • Vulnerable Version: <= 5.6.67
  • CVE: CVE-2025-4322
  • Severity: 9.8 (Critical)
  • CWE ID: CWE-620
  • CWE Name: Unverified Password Change
  • Patched: ✅ Yes
  • Patch Priority: ⚫ Critical
  • Date Published: May 19, 2025

⚠️ Summary of the Vulnerability:

  • The Motors WordPress theme (up to and including version 5.6.67) contains a critical authentication flaw in its password reset functionality.

  • It provides a front-end password update mechanism via endpoints, but fails to properly validate user identity or authorization before processi+ ng password changes.

  • As a result, unauthenticated attackers can send crafted HTTP requests that supply a user_id, an arbitrary hash_check, and a new password (stm_new_password) to reset any user’s password — including administrators.

If exploited, this allows attackers to:

  • Gain administrative access,

  • Take over the entire site,

  • Deploy persistent backdoors or malicious plugins.

🧪 Proof of Concept (PoC):

📥 Request (e.g., via curl):

🛠️ Where’s the flaw?

  • The Motors theme exposes a front-end password reset handler via endpoints like /login, /register, /loginregister, etc
  • This handler accepts user_id, hash_check, and stm_new_password via unauthenticated HTTP POST requests
  • The theme fails to verify the identity or authenticity of the requester
  • As long as an attacker supplies a valid or bypassable hash_check, the system processes password changes blindly
  • There is no authentication, nonce validation, or ownership check before updating user credentials

🔐 Recommendation

  • Disable or restrict access to the /loginregister/ or similar front-end endpoints if not in use
  • Implement strict identity validation before processing password reset requests (e.g., logged-in user check, secure token validation)
  • Avoid relying on client-supplied user_id or hash_check without server-side verification
  • Apply updates to the latest version of the Motors theme, or use virtual patching (e.g., via WAF) to block unauthorized POST requests
  • Regularly audit public-facing endpoints for unexpected or undocumented behavior

⚠️ Disclaimer

This report is for educational and authorized security testing purposes only.
Exploitation of this vulnerability without permission may violate legal and ethical boundaries.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Motors WordPress Theme 未经身份验证的权限提升漏洞

entry.title: Claude Code Improper Authorization via websocket connections from arbitrary origins
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9f65-56v6-gxw7

仓库 Star： 14811

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/security/advisories/GHSA-9f65-56v6-gxw7

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9f65-56v6-gxw7

描述：

Claude Code extensions in VSCode and forks (e.g., Cursor, Windsurf, and VSCodium) and JetBrains IDEs (e.g., IntelliJ, Pycharm, and Android Studio) are vulnerable to unauthorized websocket connections from an attacker when visiting attacker-controlled webpages. Claude Code for VSCode IDE extensions versions 0.2.116 through 1.0.23 are vulnerable. For Jetbrains IDE plugins, Claude Code [beta] versions 0.1.1 through 0.1.8 are vulnerable.

In VSCode (and forks), exploitation would allow an attacker to read arbitrary files, see the list of files open in the IDE, get selection and diagnostics events from the IDE, or execute code in limited situations where a user has an open Jupyter Notebook and accepts a malicious prompt. In JetBrains IDEs, an attacker could get selection events, a list of open files, and a list of syntax errors.

Remediation

We released a patch for this issue on June 13th, 2025. Although Claude Code auto-updates when you launch it and auto-updates the extensions, you should take the following steps (the exact steps depend on your IDE).

VSCode, Cursor, Windsurf, VSCodium, and other VSCode forks
Extension Name: Claude Code for VSCode

Instructions:

  1. Open the list of Extensions (View->Extensions)
  2. Look for Claude Code for VSCode among installed extensions
  3. If you have a version < 1.0.24, click “Update” (or “Uninstall”)
  4. Restart the IDE

All JetBrains IDEs including IntelliJ, PyCharm, and Android Studio
Plugin name: Claude Code [Beta]

Instructions:

  1. Open the Plugins list
  2. Look for Claude Code [Beta] among installed extensions
  3. Update (or Uninstall) the plugin if the version is < 0.1.9
  4. Restart the IDE
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9f65-56v6-gxw7
